main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted at Goodfellow AFB, Texas on 15 June 1966, observed for 3 to 4 minutes.
interesting points: The object moved from south to a southerly direction across the sky before disappearing,It reappeared almost immediately after fading and climbed in altitude before moving westward,The sighting involved two military witnesses,The object was described to be twice the size of an aircraft seen below it,The conclusion includes possibilities of it being a satellite or an aircraft.
witness description: Military personnel stationed at Goodfellow AFB
